Math class

　Almost compatible with JavaScript Math.

Implemented methods:
abs (Absolute value)
acos (arc Cosine)
asin (arc Sine)
atan (arc Tangent)
atan2 (two-variable arc tangent)
ceil (round up)
floor (round down)
exp (eto the nth power)
log (Natural log)
max (returns the largest of the two values)
min (returns the smallest of the two values)
random (generates a number between 0 and 1)
pow (exponent)
round(rounding to int)
sin (sine)
cos (cosine)
tan (tangent)
sqrt (square root)

Implemented properties:
E (e)
LN10 (log(10))
LN2 (log(2))
LOG10E (Logarithm of e with 10 as the base)
LOG2E (Logarithm of e with 2 as the base)
PI (π)
SQRT1_2 (sqrt(1/2))
SQRT2 (sqrt(2))
